note.p: Landowner. Born in Rollestone, Staffordshire. Brother of Frances Mosley Wedgwood. Married Caroline Sophia Paget in 1824.

p.hi: Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1972/59/15)
